about_the_game:
Watch your enemies quake in fear with the Flesh & Blood DLC pack, containing two weapon skins decorated in the remains of previous foes. Usable on all in-game guns, these visceral designs will strike fear in even the boldest of adversaries.

Features:
  • Stripped flesh (weapon skin)
  • Bloodlust (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
